meaningMnemonic: In your <radical>mouth</radical> you put a <radical>sword</radical> and a <radical>knife</radical>. Now that you have them in there, you have to make them <kanji>separate</kanji> from each other.
readingMnemonic: Why are you trying to make a sword and knife <kanji>separate</kanji> in your mouth? Because someone <reading>bets</reading> (べつ) you can't do it.
